column5: Not sure if any of the Fly guys are looking but Orvis has the Battenkill  Bar stock reels for 50% off.  Ticks me off because I was looking at them for a month then bought a complete from BPS last week   Also the Hydros Large arbour reels are on sale.  Ian
as much as that is a good deal, i can't bring myself to use an orvis
I love my Orvis,s. Bought 2 from a member here,brought over the pond,and never used, New in the box,with spare spools.
i know that they are a good product, ijust can't support them, even though they are buying out the competition ie ross reels/rods and SA

I can understand. Just like many other companies. Buy out.  Im just new to the fly fishing.First full year,loving it  Everything I have bought from members has been new or just like new. I,m pretty much set.,,,,,,,,,,,,, for now,one, never knows.
you'll never be done, you have the grand and notty around you, eventually you'll have every weight rod, including spey and or switch rods
Please dont go there. Im in deep as it is.  Sry dear.
haha, sorry misfish,  my next rod will be a 7 wt switch, either that or a 3wt for resident trout on the dry fly
Maybe I should go back to a boat.LOL
you can fly fish from a boat, just picked up some bass poppers lol
